item.title: 专家们对比特币 100,000 美元里程碑的反应
item.description: "对于真正的信徒来说，这是一个巨大的里程碑，也可能是资产合法化的证据"。【原文："It's a massive milestone for the true believers and possibly evidence of the asset's legitimisation."】

item.title: 比特币突破 100,000 美元，因对特朗普加密货币计划持乐观态度
item.description: 自特朗普在大选中大获全胜以来，比特币今年的价值已经翻了一番多，在四周内上涨了约 45%。【原文：Bitcoin has more than doubled in value this year and is up about 45% in the four weeks since Trump's sweeping election victory, which also saw a slew of pro-crypto lawmakers being elected to Congress.】

item.title: 降息押注提振股市，比特币逼近 10 万美元
item.description: 在华尔街创下历史新高之后，周四亚洲股市涨跌不一，原因是美国服务业数据疲软增强了投资者对美联储降息的信心。【原文：Asian stocks were mixed on Thursday in the wake of record peaks on Wall Street as a softer read on U.S. services data boosted investor confidence in the Fed lowering interest rates.】

item.title: 欧元震荡，韩元持稳，政治动荡影响情绪
item.description: 周四，在普遍预期的法国政府垮台后，欧元走势低迷，激起了人们对该地区第二大经济强国的担忧。【原文：The euro was subdued on Thursday after the widely expected collapse of the French government, stoking worries about the region's second-biggest economic power, while the South Korean won steadied in the aftermath of the martial law debacle.】

item.title: 关注欧佩克+供应决定，油价上涨
item.description: 在当天晚些时候举行的欧佩克+会议之前，油价周四有所上涨，投资者在关注中东紧张局势的同时，也在等待产油国集团在削减供应方面的下一步行动。【原文：Oil prices rose on Thursday ahead of an OPEC+ meeting later in the day, with investors waiting to see what the producer group would do next on supply cuts while also monitoring tension in the Middle East.】

item.title: 日产老板内田为拯救汽车制造商和自己的工作而努力奋斗
item.description: 10 月初，日产汽车公司的经理们拨通了与老板内田诚的定期在线会议的电话，却听到了一个严峻的消息：业务比预期的要差，日本汽车制造商必须裁员减产。【原文：In early October, Nissan Motor managers dialed in for a regular online meeting with boss Makoto Uchida only to hear a grim message: business was worse than expected and the Japanese car maker had to cut jobs and production.】

item.title: 据彭博新闻社报道，Synapse 倒闭后，FDIC 寻求直接监控金融科技公司
item.description: 据彭博新闻社周三报道，美国联邦存款保险公司已开始直接监控全美与银行合作的金融科技公司。【原文：The Federal Deposit Insurance Corporation has started to directly monitor financial-technology companies that partner with banks across the U.S., Bloomberg News reported on Wednesday.】

item.title: 美国法院批准债权人协议后，巴西 Natura&Co 公司恢复雅芳交易研究
item.description: 巴西化妆品生产商 Natura&Co 公司在周三提交的一份证券文件中表示，该公司将再次开始权衡如何处理其在拉丁美洲以外的雅芳业务。【原文：Brazilian cosmetics maker Natura&Co will once again start to weigh what to do with its Avon business outside Latin America, it said in a securities filing on Wednesday.】

item.title: SentinelOne 季度利润不及预期，股价下跌
item.description: SentinelOne 周三未能达到华尔街对其第三季度利润的预期，这家网络安全公司正努力应对来自大型同行的激烈竞争，股价在盘后交易中下跌超过 12%。【原文：SentinelOne missed Wall Street estimates for third-quarter profit on Wednesday, as the cybersecurity firm grapples with stiff competition from larger peers, sending its shares down more than 12% in extended trading.】

item.title: 戒严未遂后韩国政府将启动市场稳定基金
item.description: 韩国财政部周四表示，在总统尹锡烈解除戒严令对金融市场造成影响后，政府将启动价值 40 万亿韩元（约合 283.5 亿美元）的市场稳定基金。【原文：South Korea's Finance Ministry said on Thursday that the government will activate 40 trillion won ($28.35 billion) worth of market stabilization fund, after President Yoon Suk Yeol's lifting of a martial law declaration affected financial markets.】

item.title: 马斯克的 xAI 计划在孟菲斯大规模扩建人工智能超级计算机
item.description: 大孟菲斯商会（Greater Memphis Chamber）周三表示，埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）的人工智能初创公司xAI计划扩建其位于田纳西州孟菲斯的超级计算机，以容纳至少一百万个图形处理器（GPU）。【原文：Elon Musk's artificial intelligence startup xAI plans to expand its Memphis, Tennessee, supercomputer to house at least one million graphics processing units (GPUs), the Greater Memphis Chamber said on Wednesday, as xAI races to compete against rivals like OpenAI.】

item.title: 销售前景不及预期，Synopsys 股价下跌
item.description: 芯片设计软件公司新思公司（Synopsys）周三预计，2025 财年的收入将低于华尔街预期，部分原因是美国加强了对中国芯片技术销售的控制，导致中国销售下滑。【原文：Chip design software firm Synopsys on Wednesday forecast fiscal 2025 revenue below Wall Street expectations thanks in part to a slump in China sales as the U.S. tightens controls on what chip technology can be sold to the country.】

item.title: 早间新闻首尔暂时平静，美国巨轮继续前进
item.description: 亚洲市场前瞻【原文：A look at the day ahead in Asian markets.】

item.title: 英特尔临时联席首席执行官津斯纳称新任首席执行官将拥有代工经验
item.description: 英特尔临时联席首席执行官大卫-津斯纳（David Zinsner）在周三举行的瑞银（UBS）技术大会上表示，英特尔将拥有一位既有制造专长又有产品方面经验的首席执行官。【原文：Intel will have a CEO with manufacturing expertise as well as experience in the product side of the business, interim co-CEO David Zinsner said at the UBS technology conference on Wednesday.】

item.title: 高级官员称 "大量 "美国人的元数据被中国黑客窃取
item.description: 一位美国高级官员周三告诉记者，在一个名为 "盐台风 "的中国黑客组织开展的大规模网络间谍活动中，大量美国人的元数据被窃取。【原文：A large number of Americans' metadata has been stolen in the sweeping cyberespionage campaign carried out by a Chinese hacking group dubbed "Salt Typhoon," a senior U.S. official told journalists on Wednesday.】

item.title: 美国鹰服装公司因假日预期低迷而下调销售目标
item.description: 美国鹰服装公司（American Eagle Outfitters）周三下调了年度可比销售额增长目标，这表明服装需求在假日购物季期间可能会不稳定，导致其股价在盘后交易中下跌了 13%。【原文：American Eagle Outfitters cut its target for annual comparable sales growth on Wednesday, in signs that apparel demand could be erratic during the holiday shopping season, sending its shares down 13% in extended trade.】

item.title: 墨西哥 Elektra 公司股价下滑，抹去了前一天的涨幅
item.description: 墨西哥零售商埃莱克特拉集团（Grupo Elektra）的股价在周三下午的交易中下跌了近 11%，超过了前一天收复的失地。【原文：Shares in Mexican retailer Grupo Elektra sank by nearly 11% in afternoon trading on Wednesday, more than wiping out the ground recovered the day before.】

item.title: 美国法官裁定，塔吉特必须面对股东就骄傲反弹提起的诉讼
item.description: 塔吉特未能说服佛罗里达州的一名法官驳回指控该零售商欺骗股东的诉讼，因为它在骄傲月销售以 LGBTQ 为主题的商品引发了反弹和顾客抵制。【原文：Target has failed to persuade a judge in Florida to dismiss a lawsuit that accused the retailer of deceiving shareholders after its sales of LGBTQ-themed merchandise for Pride Month sparked a backlash and a customer boycott.】

item.title: Meta 将投资 100 亿美元建设路易斯安那州数据中心
item.description: Facebook 母公司 Meta 周三表示，计划投资 100 亿美元在路易斯安那州建立一个人工智能数据中心，这将是该科技公司在全球最大的数据中心。【原文：Facebook-parent Meta said on Wednesday it plans to invest $10 billion to set up an AI data center in Louisiana, in what would be the tech company's largest data center in the world.】

item.title: 新西兰恒天然集团报告第一季度利润下降
item.description: 恒天然合作社（Fonterra Co-operative）周四报告称，第一季度税后利润下降，主要是受到销量下降和牛奶价格上涨的影响。【原文：Fonterra Co-operative reported a drop in its first-quarter profit after tax on Thursday, flagging impacts from lower sales volume and higher milk prices.】

item.title: 美联储调查显示，最近几周美国经济略有增长
item.description: 美联储周三在一份统称为 "米色报告 "的全国调查和访谈摘要中表示，自10月初以来，美国大部分地区的经济活动略有扩张，就业增长 "低迷"，通胀率小幅上升，企业对未来表示乐观。【原文：U.S. economic activity has expanded slightly in most regions since early October, with employment growth "subdued" and inflation rising at a modest pace and businesses expressing optimism about the future, the Federal Reserve said on Wednesday in a summary of surveys and interviews from across the country known collectively as the "Beige Book."】

item.title: 国防公司 Anduril 与 OpenAI 合作，在国家安全任务中使用人工智能
item.description: 国防技术公司 Anduril Industries 和 ChatGPT 制造商 OpenAI 周三宣布建立合作伙伴关系，为国家安全任务开发和部署先进的人工智能解决方案。【原文：Defense technology company Anduril Industries and ChatGPT-maker OpenAI on Wednesday announced a partnership to develop and deploy advanced artificial intelligence solutions for national security missions.】

item.title: 由于投入成本上升，Chipotle 墨西哥烤肉店提高了菜单价格
item.description: 墨西哥卷饼连锁店 Chipotle Mexican Grill 周三表示，该公司已将菜单价格上调约 2%，以应对在美国餐饮业需求不稳定的环境下投入成本的增加。【原文：Chipotle Mexican Grill said on Wednesday it has raised menu prices by about 2%, as the burrito chain counters higher input costs in the midst of a choppy demand environment for restaurants in the United States.】

item.title: 花旗集团在八个国家为员工推出人工智能工具
item.description: 花旗集团高级管理人员表示，花旗集团周三开始推出新的人工智能工具，供八个国家的员工使用。【原文：Citigroup began rolling out on Wednesday new artificial intelligence tools to be used by employees in eight countries, senior executives said.】

item.title: 爱尔兰老激进分子将就电视剧《什么都别说》中的描述起诉迪士尼
item.description: 爱尔兰资深激进分子玛丽安-普赖斯（Marian Price）对沃尔特-迪斯尼（Walt Disney）提起了法律诉讼，因为她在 1972 年热播的美国流媒体剧集《什么也别说》中被描绘成杀害了珍-麦康维尔（Jean McConville）。【原文：Veteran Irish militant Marian Price has initiated legal proceedings against Walt Disney after she was depicted killing Jean McConville in 1972 in the hit U.S. streaming series "Say Nothing."】

item.title: 在耐克鞋需求疲软的情况下，Foot Locker 将在门店主推耐克新款鞋
item.description: Foot Locker 公司高管周三表示，他们正与耐克公司密切合作，在假日购物季来临之际，在对这家运动鞋巨头的产品需求 "疲软 "的情况下，强调其较新的款式，包括 Vomero 和 Air DT Max 鞋款。【原文：Foot Locker executives said on Wednesday they are working closely with Nike to emphasize its newer styles, including Vomero and Air DT Max shoe models, amid "softness" in demand for the sneaker giant's products as the holiday shopping season begins.】

item.title: Soitec 将为 GlobalFoundries 的 9SW 平台提供晶圆
item.description: Soitec将为GlobalFoundries（GF）的最新无线电平台提供RF-SOI晶圆。【原文：Soitec will supply GlobalFoundries (GF) with its RF-SOI wafers for GF's latest radio platform.】

item.title: 意大利联合信贷银行首席执行官告诉投资者，该行将在 3 月前改善 Banco BPM 的竞购方案
item.description: 据一位参加了虚拟会议的人士称，联合信贷银行首席执行官 Andrea Orcel 在周三的投资者电话会议上表示，联合信贷银行将在 3 月份之前评估改进其对 Banco BPM 的收购要约。【原文：UniCredit has until March to evaluate improving its takeover bid for Banco BPM , CEO Andrea Orcel told an investor call on Wednesday according to a person who attended the virtual meeting.】

item.title: 贝莱德投资研究所进一步 "增持 "美国股票
item.description: 贝莱德投资研究所（BII）周三表示，随着人工智能在各行各业的广泛应用释放出买入机会，贝莱德已进一步 "增持 "美国股市，即使美国股市正处于历史高位。【原文：The BlackRock Investment Institute (BII) said on Wednesday that it had gone further "overweight" on U.S. equities as greater adoption of AI unlocks buying opportunities across sectors, even with U.S. stocks trading at record highs.】

item.title: 消息人士称，空中客车公司在国防与航天领域裁员2000多人
item.description: 两位熟知内情的人士透露，空中客车公司将在其国防与amp; 航天部门裁员2043人，而此前预计的裁员人数为2500人。【原文：Airbus is cutting 2,043 jobs in its Defence & Space division, compared with its earlier estimate of up to 2,500 job reductions, two people familiar with the matter said.】
